summary: 1972  was a leap year starting on Saturday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
1972  was a leap year starting on Saturday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1972nd year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 972nd year of the 2nd millennium, the 72nd year of the 20th century, and the 3rd year of the 1970s decade.
Within the context of Coordinated Universal Time  it was the longest year ever, as two leap seconds were added during this 366-day year, an event which has not since been repeated. .
